content: I think everyone in the community is aligned on this RFC. I am willing to implement it. What are the next steps? https://github.com/rust-lang/rfcs/pull/3020
It's in the queue for review. It takes quite a bit of time to read through everything and try to digest. Will try to get to it when we can.
Regarding the render link, it helps to use a branch for PRs so it can be linked directly to the branch so it always gets the latest version.
@Eric Huss Hey, thanks for the review on https://github.com/rust-lang/rfcs/pull/3020. I addressed your comment, but still unsure about what you meant by some of your sentences.
I want to make sure there's no misunderstanding happening. So, please free to ping me here if you have any questions
